findings.rationale: Licensor's unlimited liability for indemnification places significant financial risk on Licensee without any cap on potential claims.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any limitation of liability clause, Licensor's liability for indemnification is unlimited.

findings.rationale: Perpetual confidentiality obligations may expose Licensee to ongoing risks of non-compliance without a clear end date.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations are perpetual and survive termination without any time limitation.

findings.rationale: An upfront payment of $200,000 due within 10 days may strain the Licensee's cash flow and financial stability.
findings.evidence_quote: Licensee shall pay upfront license fees of $200,000, due within 10 days.

findings.rationale: Mandatory arbitration may limit Licensee's options for legal recourse and can be costly and time-consuming.
findings.evidence_quote: All disputes must be resolved through binding arbitration under the rules of the International Chamber of Commerce.

findings.rationale: Licensor's ability to recover all attorneys' fees from Licensee in disputes may deter Licensee from pursuing legitimate claims.
findings.evidence_quote: In any action to enforce this Agreement, Licensor shall recover all attorneys' fees, costs, and expenses from Licensee.
